articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home 
   Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK headed by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Kye Gwan returned home Wednesday after participating in the DPRK-U.S. talks in Berlin from Jan. 16 to 18. 
 It was greeted at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, officials concerned, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and Russian Charge d' Affaires AI here Alexander Matsegora.

articles.title: Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in America
Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Feb. 16 Formed in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in America 
   Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The American Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was jointly formed with due ceremony on Jan. 16 by the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the U.S. Solidarity Committee for Supporting the Struggle of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front of South Korea and the South Korean People.
 John Paul Cupp, chairman of the group, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.    
 The preparatory committee decided to intensify the activities to introduce immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and conduct a movement to express solidarity with the cause of the Korean people among various progressive organizations and prominent figures in the U.S. on the above-said occasions.

articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Feb. 16 Formed in Kyrgyzstan 
   Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan for Celebrating February 16, the birthday of Kim Jong Il, was formed in Bishkek on Jan. 18.
 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to host multifarious events including a meeting, a stage performance, a film show and a photo exhibition on the occasion.
